activities_info.details:
Please note that this activity is a combined effort between the Howard University, Georgetown, and George Washington University Schools of Medicine. Although the leadership team is composed of medical students from these three institutions, our volunteer pool has expanded to include student volunteers from undergraduate and graduate schools to better match the needs of healthcare workers.

An inititiave to provide childcare to healthcare workers in the DMV area through student volunteerism (undergraduate and graduate permitted).

Please note that this activity is a combined effort between the Howard University, Georgetown, and George Washington University Schools of Medicine. Although the leadership team is composed of medical students from these three institutions, our volunteer pool has expanded to include student volunteers from undergraduate and graduate schools to better match the needs of healthcare workers.

Running grocery errands to healthcare workers in the DMV area through student volunteerism (undergrad and grad).

Please note that this activity is a combined effort between the Howard University, Georgetown, and George Washington University Schools of Medicine. Although the leadership team is composed of medical students from these three institutions, our volunteer pool has expanded to include student volunteers from undergraduate and graduate schools to better match the needs of healthcare workers.

Providing petsitting to healthcare workers in the DMV area through student volunteerism (undergrad and grad).

Please note that this activity is a combined effort between the Howard University, Georgetown, and George Washington University Schools of Medicine. Although the leadership team is composed of medical students from these three institutions, our volunteer pool has expanded to include student volunteers from undergraduate and graduate schools to better match the needs of healthcare workers.

Part of the initiative above, being reached out to news organizations and reporters who wish to cover these efforts and increase our reach to healthcare workers who may be in need of childcare, petsitting, or in need of errands to be taken care of while they are at work in the front lines of the pandemic.
